00001 % =====================================================================
00002 %> @brief alg_NewtonRa_Limit calculates one step of Newton Raphson iteration
00003 %> with constrain for permittivity value, that is not less than 1
00004 %>
00005 %> @param S    sensitivity matrix
00006 %> @param Cr   vector of capacitances to be measured for current estimation of Ep
00007 %> @param Cm   vector of measured capacitances
00008 %> @param Ep   current estimation of permittivity distribution (previous step) in form of column vector
00009 %> @param alfa relaxation factor (step length)
00010 %> @param u    Thikonov regularization factor for matrix pseudo inverse
00011 %> @param constrain 'constrain' to limit permittivity value
00012 %> @param lt   lower threshold
00013 %> @param ut   upper threshold
00014 %>
00015 %> @retval Ep (column vector) new better estimation of permittivity 
00016 % =====================================================================
00017 function Ep = alg_NewtonRa_Limit(rec_obj,S,Cr,Cm,Ep,alfa,u,constrain,lt,ut)
00018 
00019 deltaC = Cr-Cm;
00020 
00021 pinvS = S'*inv(S*S' + u*eye(size(S,1),size(S,1))); 
00022 
00023 Ep = Ep - alfa*pinvS*deltaC;
00024 
00025 % constrain: we know that eps >= 1
00026 if strcmp(constrain,'constrain')==1
00027     [p] = find(Ep<lt);
00028     Ep(p) = lt;
00029     [p] = find(Ep>ut);
00030     Ep(p) = ut;
00031 end
00032     
00033     
00034 % Ep = Ep - alfa*S'*deltaC;
00035 % 
00036 % 
00037 % % inner insulator properties are known
00038 % for n=1:sensor.matrix_size*sensor.matrix_size
00039 %      [ii,jj]=wspolrzedne(n,sensor.matrix_size);
00040 %      if bitand(sensor.M(ii,jj),sensor.insulator1.mask) 
00041 %          Ep(n,1)=sensor.insulator1.permit;
00042 %      end
00043 % end
00044 
00045 % FOVidx=bitand(sensor.M,sensor.fov.mask)==sensor.fov.mask;
00046 % Ep(FOVidx)=Ep(FOVidx)-alfa*S(:,FOVidx)'*deltaC;
00047 
00048 % ######
00049 % S=normsens(S);
00050 % 
00051 % Ep=Ep-alfa*S'*deltaC;
00052 % ######
00053 
00054 
00055     
00056 % MO rekonstrukcja powinna byæ w ma³ej rozdzielczoci
00057 % for n=1:sensor.discret_matrix_size*sensor.discret_matrix_size
00058 %     [ii,jj]=map_coord(n,sensor.discret_matrix_size);

00060 %         Ep(n,1)=Ep(n,1) - alfa*S(:,n)'*deltaC;
00061 %     end
